entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 early this morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
